recipesJson.name: Mellow Pomelo | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, Graham, and Folkart.
This recipe was suggested by Kevin Arrowood.  He suggested making a grapefruit top note profile and this was our result, a Grapefruit Sour Gummy.  Full flavor notes on DEVELOPED Episode 43 at https://youtu.be/bJqc7ol55vU .

Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

reviews.text: This is among the most delicious recipes I've ever come across. Sweet, citrusy and well balanced, the grapefruit notes are excellent and work well with the candy/gummy vibe. It has a nice texture to it, almost chalky, but in a super delicious and enjoyable way. Thank you for sharing !
Brilliant. WF sour gummy candy is amazing, there is so much you can do with it and it needs to be used much more.

The flavor I get off this recipe is bright and vibrant. A fantastic representation of the flavor of grapefruit. Nice and balanced, smooth and refreshing. Exactly what I was looking for. Another ADV by the Developed Crew.
